column4: What would be the benefit of using ubuntu in an elementary enviornment over a windows one?
I also do volunteer work at my local YMCA, what would be the best way to filter 'bad' searches on the linux machines there?

there isn't a best way to filter bad searches as far as I know but you can filter people to accessing bad sites by using a transparent proxy (see squid) and one of the modules / add-ins that helps block content you don't want users accessing
escott is right. physical access is root access. Lock your box in a safe and burry it under 20 feet of concrete
